14.post_text: #Ferrari 308 GTB’s elongated shape made its debut in 1975 as the first Ferrari production car to feature fiberglass as a body material. #Ferrari70

comments.message: The "Millechiodi" stood for years in Maranello in a junkyard!

Pininnferina's own words at Concorso Italiano 2001 "At that time, we began to experiment with fiberglass and produced a few cars. One day, Enzo came down from his office into the factory floor and said, 'No more fiberglass. Aluminum only. I don't want our cars like the American Corvette', and so that day, ended fiberglass production". It was amazing to hear Pininnferina speak that day, of his experiences with many Ferrari cars.
the millechiodi: it’s bodyshape resulted in the design of the 288 GTO
You can see the start of the Mondial , great little car enjoyed mine for 7 years and 35000 miles.
